properties.description: Get data from Ammex_Staging database on Matterhorn

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
FROM [ETL].[AdfLoadControl]
WHERE [SourceDatabase] = 'Denali'
	  AND [SourceObjectType] = 'Table'
	  AND [IsLoad] = 1
	  AND [IsLoadTesting] = 0

use msdb
go
SELECT DISTINCT --ETLID.execution_id,
   JobID = jobhist.job_id,
JobName = jobs.name,
JobCategory = categories.name,
IsJobEnabled = CASE jobs.enabled WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END,
IsJobScheduled = CASE schedule.enabled WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END,
JobDescription = jobs.Description,
Frequency =
CASE WHEN schedule.freq_type = 1 THEN 'Once'
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 4
 AND schedule.freq_subday_type = 8 THEN 'Hourly'
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 4 THEN 'Daily'
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 8 THEN 'Weekly'
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 16 THEN 'Monthly'
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 32 THEN 'Monthly relative'
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 64 THEN 'When SQL Server Agent starts'
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 128 THEN 'Start whenever the CPU(s) become idle'
ELSE ''
END,
FrequencySorting =
CASE WHEN schedule.freq_type = 1 THEN ' 01 Once'
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 4
 AND schedule.freq_subday_type = 8 THEN ' 02 Hourly'
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 4 THEN ' 04 Daily'
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 8 THEN ' 08 Weekly'
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 16 THEN ' 16 Monthly'
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 32 THEN ' 32 Monthly relative'
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 64 THEN ' 64 When SQL Server Agent starts'
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 128 THEN '128 Start whenever the CPU(s) become idle'
ELSE ''
END,
FrequencyOccur =
CASE WHEN schedule.freq_type = 1 THEN 'One Time'
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 4
 AND schedule.freq_subday_type = 2 THEN 'Every ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, schedule.freq_interval) + ' Seconds(s)'
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 4
 AND schedule.freq_subday_type =  4 THEN 'Every ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, schedule.freq_interval) + ' Minute(s)'
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 4
 AND schedule.freq_subday_type = 8 THEN 'Every ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, schedule.freq_interval) + ' Hour(s)'
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 4
 AND schedule.freq_subday_type NOT IN(2,4,8) THEN  'Every ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, schedule.freq_interval) + ' day(s)'
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 8 THEN 'Every ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, schedule.freq_recurrence_factor) + ' weeks(s) on ' +
LEFT(
CASE WHEN schedule.freq_interval &  1 =  1 THEN 'Sunday, '    ELSE '' END +
CASE WHEN schedule.freq_interval &  2 =  2 THEN 'Monday, '    ELSE '' END +
CASE WHEN schedule.freq_interval &  4 =  4 THEN 'Tuesday, '   ELSE '' END +
CASE WHEN schedule.freq_interval &  8 =  8 THEN 'Wednesday, ' ELSE '' END +
CASE WHEN schedule.freq_interval & 16 = 16 THEN 'Thursday, '  ELSE '' END +
CASE WHEN schedule.freq_interval & 32 = 32 THEN 'Friday, '    ELSE '' END +
CASE WHEN schedule.freq_interval & 64 = 64 THEN 'Saturday, '  ELSE '' END ,
LEN(
CASE WHEN schedule.freq_interval &  1 =  1 THEN 'Sunday, '    ELSE '' END +
CASE WHEN schedule.freq_interval &  2 =  2 THEN 'Monday, '    ELSE '' END +
CASE WHEN schedule.freq_interval &  4 =  4 THEN 'Tuesday, '   ELSE '' END +
CASE WHEN schedule.freq_interval &  8 =  8 THEN 'Wednesday, ' ELSE '' END +
CASE WHEN schedule.freq_interval & 16 = 16 THEN 'Thursday, '  ELSE '' END +
CASE WHEN schedule.freq_interval & 32 = 32 THEN 'Friday, '    ELSE '' END +
CASE WHEN schedule.freq_interval & 64 = 64 THEN 'Saturday, '  ELSE '' END
) - 1
)
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 16 THEN 'Day ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, schedule.freq_interval) + ' of every ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, schedule.freq_recurrence_factor) + ' month(s)'
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 32 THEN 'The ' +
CASE schedule.freq_relative_interval
WHEN  1 THEN 'First'
WHEN  2 THEN 'Second'
WHEN  4 THEN 'Third'
WHEN  8 THEN 'Fourth'
WHEN 16 THEN 'Last'
END +
CASE schedule.freq_interval
WHEN  1 THEN ' Sunday'
WHEN  2 THEN ' Monday'
WHEN  3 THEN ' Tuesday'
WHEN  4 THEN ' Wednesday'
WHEN  5 THEN ' Thursday'
WHEN  6 THEN ' Friday'
WHEN  7 THEN ' Saturday'
WHEN  8 THEN ' Day'
WHEN  9 THEN ' Weekday'
WHEN 10 THEN ' Weekend Day'
END + ' of every ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, schedule.freq_recurrence_factor) + ' month(s)'
ELSE ''
END,
FrequencyOccurDetail =
CASE schedule.freq_subday_type
WHEN 0 THEN 'Occurs once at ' + STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), schedule.active_start_time), 6), 5, 0, ':'), 3, 0, ':')
WHEN 1 THEN 'Occurs every day at ' + STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), schedule.active_start_time), 6), 5, 0, ':'), 3, 0, ':')
WHEN 2 THEN 'Occurs every ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, schedule.freq_subday_interval) + ' Seconds(s) between ' + STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), schedule.active_start_time), 6), 5, 0, ':'), 3, 0, ':') + ' and ' + STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), schedule.active_end_time), 6), 5, 0, ':'), 3, 0, ':')
WHEN 4 THEN 'Occurs every ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, schedule.freq_subday_interval) + ' Minute(s) between ' + STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), schedule.active_start_time), 6), 5, 0, ':'), 3, 0, ':') + ' and ' + STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), schedule.active_end_time), 6), 5, 0, ':'), 3, 0, ':')
WHEN 8 THEN 'Occurs every ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, schedule.freq_subday_interval) + ' Hour(s) between ' + STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), schedule.active_start_time), 6), 5, 0, ':'), 3, 0, ':') + ' and ' + STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), schedule.active_end_time), 6), 5, 0, ':'), 3, 0, ':')
ELSE ''
END,
FrequencyOccursTime =
CASE WHEN schedule.freq_type = 1 THEN STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), schedule.active_start_time), 6), 5, 0, ':'), 3, 0, ':')
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 4 THEN STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), schedule.active_start_time), 6), 5, 0, ':'), 3, 0, ':')
WHEN schedule.freq_type = 8 THEN STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), schedule.active_start_time), 6), 5, 0, ':'), 3, 0, ':')
WHEN schedule.freq_subday_type = 16 THEN STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), schedule.active_start_time), 6), 5, 0, ':'), 3, 0, ':')
WHEN schedule.freq_subday_type = 32 THEN STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), schedule.active_start_time), 6), 5, 0, ':'), 3, 0, ':')
ELSE ''
END,
FrequencyOccursDateTime = case WHEN jobs.enabled = 1
 AND schedule.enabled = 1 then msdb.dbo.agent_datetime(jobschedule.next_run_date,schedule.active_start_time) end,

   JobStepID = JobHist.step_id,
JobStepName = JobHist.step_name,
JobSteps.command,
JobStepPackageName = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(550), CASE WHEN JobSteps.subsystem = 'SSIS' THEN right(left(JobSteps.command, charindex('.dtsx',JobSteps.command) + 4), charindex('\', reverse(left(JobSteps.command, charindex('.dtsx',JobSteps.command) + 4))))
 ELSE JobSteps.command
 END),
JobStepPackagePath = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(550), CASE WHEN JobSteps.subsystem = 'SSIS' THEN substring(left(JobSteps.command, charindex('.dtsx',JobSteps.command) + 4),14,charindex('.dtsx',JobSteps.command) + 4)
ELSE '' END),
  --JobStepDurationInSecond = JobSteps.last_run_duration,
  --JobStepLastRunDate = JobSteps.last_run_date,
  --JobStepLastRunTime = JobSteps.last_run_time,
   JobExecutionStatus =  CASE jobhist.run_status
  WHEN 0 THEN 'Failed'
  WHEN 1 THEN 'Succeeded'
  WHEN 2 THEN 'Retry'
  WHEN 3 THEN 'Canceled'
  ELSE '' END,

   IsRunCurrentWeek = CASE WHEN msdb.dbo.agent_datetime(jobhist.run_date, jobhist.run_time) BETWEEN DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate()) /7*7, 0) AND DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day, 6, getdate()-1) /7*7 + 7, 6) THEN 'Yes'
ELSE 'No' END,
   RunDateTime = msdb.dbo.agent_datetime(jobhist.run_date, jobhist.run_time),
        RunDate = jobhist.run_date,
   RunTime = jobhist.run_time,  
   'RunDuration[HH:MM:SS]' = CAST(msdb.dbo.agent_datetime(19000101, jobhist.run_duration) AS TIME),
   'RunDuration[sec]' = (((jobhist.run_duration / 10000 * 3600) + ((jobhist.run_duration % 10000) / 100 * 60) + (jobhist.run_duration % 10000) % 100)) * 1.0,
  LoadDate = Getdate()
FROM msdb.dbo.sysjobhistory jobhist WITH(NOLOCK)
JOIN msdb.dbo.sysjobs AS jobs WITH(NOLOCK)
 ON jobhist.job_id = jobs.job_id
JOIN msdb.dbo.syscategories categories WITH(NOLOCK)
 ON jobs.category_id = categories.category_id
LEFT JOIN msdb.dbo.sysjobschedules AS jobschedule WITH(NOLOCK)
 ON jobs.job_id = jobschedule.job_id
LEFT JOIN msdb.dbo.sysschedules AS schedule WITH(NOLOCK)
 ON jobschedule.schedule_id = schedule.schedule_id
LEFT JOIN msdb.dbo.sysjobsteps jobsteps WITH(NOLOCK)
 ON jobhist.job_id = jobsteps.job_id
    AND jobhist.step_id = jobsteps.step_id
WHERE msdb.dbo.agent_datetime(jobhist.run_date, jobhist.run_time) > '2017-10-04 22:15:26'
